channel.title: Ascaria
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/o5atcj.jpg[/img]
Welcome to the official project thread of Ascaria - Where Oldschool Meets Creativity
[url=http://www.ascaria.org/forums]Ascaria Forums[/url] [url=http://www.ascaria.org/download.html]Download Client[/url] Please note: we are not online until January 4th - forums are fully operational
[CENTER][SIZE=5]BACKGROUND[/SIZE][/CENTER]
It was an idea to start a new, unique, never-before-seen RuneScape Private Server for months between two great friends. With months of talking about it, the motivation wasn't quite enough. But finally, we noticed that RuneScape Private Servers are just dying and repeating. In late November 2014, the name Ascaria was set in stone. Mod Jon, Owner, and Mod Four, Co-Owner, are the ones responsible for the birth of Ascaria.
[SIZE=5]STAFF TEAM[/SIZE]
[B]Server Owner:[/B] [I]Jon[/I] [B]Co-Owner:[/B] [I]Four[/I] [B]Lead Server Developer:[/B] [I]Austin[/I] [B]Server Developer:[/B] [I]Jon, Four, and JKetelaar[/I] [B]Website Developer:[/B] [I]Osiris[/I]
Everything is first [B]planned out[/B] so not only does the community see what's coming, but all the developers know exactly what to do. Everything from the client to the website is being updated daily to have the very best experience! There will be a lot of very fun custom content ranging from minigames to quests! Many of the custom content will be [I]unique, fun, and different[/I] than the average RuneScape Private Server.
[SIZE=5]MEDIA[/SIZE] [SPOILER=Ascaria Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TL0qY6E.png[/img] Our home location is based in Entrana. This is where you will start your adventure at Ascaria!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b3J1buH.png[/img] Teleport to numerous different combat locations! Start at "low-level training" and work your way to kill the King Black Dragon or maybe even a Jad!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4NP3m3x.png[/img] Custom Quests are starting to be worked on!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3JswwKm.png[/img] Sneak peak on the Mystical Disaster custom quest!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fEsb2gP.png[/img] Custom zombies game: If you like Call of Duty Zombies, you will like what we have here! This custom made zombie game runs exactly how it is in COD: Zombies! Unlock doors, get caskets, earn points, and play on teams up to 4![/SPOILER]
Media photos will constantly update as we bring new things into Ascaria![/CENTER]

item.title: Ascaria
item.dc:creator: @Ascaria Ascaria
item.description:
@Ascaria wrote:

Soulcist:

Never liked that home location - ever, the floors look ugly and the home location was always inconvenient.

We understand some issues that are caused with our chosen home location, however, we will be putting some custom made things (e.g. tiles) to help modify the location!

briney21:

says you cant play for another 8 days lol

I did write that we are not quite online yet:

Ascaria:

Please note: we are not online until January 4th - forums are fully operational

Read full topic

item.title: Ascaria
item.dc:creator: @briney21 briney21
item.description:
@briney21 wrote:

says you cant play for another 8 days lol

Read full topic

item.title: Ascaria
item.dc:creator: @Ascaria Ascaria
item.description:
@Ascaria wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to the official project thread of Ascaria - Where Oldschool Meets Creativity

Ascaria Forums
Download Client
Please note: we are not online until January 4th - forums are fully operational

[CENTER][SIZE=5]BACKGROUND[/SIZE][/CENTER]

It was an idea to start a new, unique, never-before-seen RuneScape Private Server for months between two great friends. With months of talking about it, the motivation wasn’t quite enough. But finally, we noticed that RuneScape Private Servers are just dying and repeating. In late November 2014, the name Ascaria was set in stone. Mod Jon, Owner, and Mod Four, Co-Owner, are the ones responsible for the birth of Ascaria.

[SIZE=5]STAFF TEAM[/SIZE]

[B]Server Owner:[/B] [I]Jon[/I]
[B]Co-Owner:[/B] [I]Four[/I]
[B]Lead Server Developer:[/B] [I]Austin[/I]
[B]Server Developer:[/B] [I]Jon, Four, and JKetelaar[/I]
[B]Website Developer:[/B] [I]Osiris[/I]

Everything is first [B]planned out[/B] so not only does the community see what’s coming, but all the developers know exactly what to do. Everything from the client to the website is being updated daily to have the very best experience! There will be a lot of very fun custom content ranging from minigames to quests! Many of the custom content will be [I]unique, fun, and different[/I] than the average RuneScape Private Server.

[SIZE=5]MEDIA[/SIZE]
[SPOILER=Ascaria Media]
Our home location is based in Entrana. This is where you will start your adventure at Ascaria!


Teleport to numerous different combat locations! Start at “low-level training” and work your way to kill the King Black Dragon or maybe even a Jad!


Custom Quests are starting to be worked on!


Sneak peak on the Mystical Disaster custom quest!


Custom zombies game: If you like Call of Duty Zombies, you will like what we have here! This custom made zombie game runs exactly how it is in COD: Zombies! Unlock doors, get caskets, earn points, and play on teams up to 4![/SPOILER]

Media photos will constantly update as we bring new things into Ascaria![/CENTER]
